text: Ganzourgou is a province of Burkina Faso. The province is divided into 8 departments: Commune Capital Population (Census 2006)National 2006 census preliminary results Boudry Department Boudry 80,948 Kogho Department Kogho 15,790 Méguet Department Méguet 34,724 Mogtédo Department Mogtédo 50,809 Salogo Department Salogo 21,405 Zam Department Zam 39,582 Zorgho Department Zorgho 46,898 Zoungou Department Zoungou 29,674 ==References== Category:Provinces of Burkina Faso
title: Ganzourgou Province
